description: ST looks at how BNPL can lead to a mountain of debt and how consumers can protect themselves. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Buy now, pay later schemes: How to avoid exceeding your budget and falling into debt
title_page: Buy now, pay later schemes: How to avoid exceeding your budget and falling into debt | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - A code of conduct for buy now, pay later (BNPL) providers will be released by the end of 2022.
It is a timely move as BNPL gains traction and concerns over consumer indebtedness rise.
